title: Movie App - React Native
description: A movie and TV show browsing application that fetches up-to-date content from a real-time movie API. Users can explore trending titles, search for specific films or series, and view detailed metadata including ratings, descriptions, cast information, and more.
technologies: React Native Elements for UI components
React Native Safe Area Context for handling safe areas
mainFeatures: Fetching list of movies base on the state
Search by movie or tv show name
See movie description and metadata such as title, image, popularity, and release date
future: Fetch more info about the movie
Format of the texts in the select boxes

title: FitFound - React App
description: FitFound is an innovative job-matching web application developed by a collaborative team. It reimagines the traditional hiring process. Instead of candidates endlessly applying for positions, the platform allows employers to actively search, filter, and connect with qualified talent that fits their needs. This model creates a more transparent, efficient, and mutually beneficial experience for both job seekers and companies.
contribution: Company Profile frontend: Saving and updating company profile through Express API endpoints; and pictures with Supabase.
Candidate Insights: Gemini AI features designed to provide recommendations on how to improve the profile and enhance development skills.
Candidate Insights: Charts to display statistics about search appearances and the skills that were matched in the search..
technologies: React for building a dynamic, responsive user interface
Express for a robust and efficient server-side framework
MongoDB for flexible, high-performance data storage
Supabase and Firebase for secure authentication and user management
Gemini for AI-powered features that enhance candidate-employer matching
Recharts for data visualization, giving employers and candidates clear insights into job market trends
mainFeatures: Smart Candidate Matching: Employers upload job requirements and instantly receive a list of pre-matched candidates based on skills, experience, location, and preferences using intelligent filtering.
One-Time Universal Profile for Candidates: Job seekers create a single, detailed profile that serves all future job matchesâ€”no need to reapply or re-upload data multiple times.
Direct Outreach & Interview Invitations: Employers can contact shortlisted candidates directly via personalized emails or text messages, speeding up communication and improving engagement.
Verified Hiring Badges: Once a candidate is hired, the employer can 'badge' their profile to confirm employment, adding a verifiable work record visible to future employers.
Profile Visibility Insights: Candidates can view stats on how often their profile is appearing in search results or getting shortlisted, helping them improve their visibility.
